articles.title: Frurt to open new High Wycombe store at Queens Square in May
articles.author: Timothy Edgley
articles.summary: Frurt will open its new frozen yogurt and soft serve store at 22 Queens Square, Wycombe, on May 17. The opening event will feature a 50% discount on all menu items between 12pm and 3pm. This new store marks Frurt's expansion into the south of England.

articles.title: LEGAL STUNNER: Iamaleava Brothers SUED for BREACH of NIL Contract Before Playing for UCLA Bruins?
articles.summary: WeAreIowa requires users to download the WeAreIowa app to stream content on their phones. This app serves as the platform for accessing WeAreIowa's streaming service.

articles.title: This Dyson Hair Dryer Is a Slimmed-Down Version of a Classic
articles.author: Boutayna Chokrane
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic r, a new hair tool that refines the original Supersonic design focusing on ease of use. The Supersonic r aims to simplify the user's morning routine and is priced at $570.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland set to launch new robot lawnmower dupe for garden in middle aisle – it's €700 cheaper than the real deal
articles.author: Macarten Burke
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching the Yard Force Robot Mower on May 1st, priced at €249.99, featuring Bluetooth app control and self-charging capabilities. Lidl Ireland has released the Rotary Clothes Airer, now available for €19.99, which boasts UV, frost, and corrosion resistance.

articles.title: REVIEW: Underrated Audi RS Q8 will rock your SUV boat
articles.summary: Audi launched the revamped RS Q8 Performance SUV, featuring exterior and technical enhancements, including a new grille, playful headlights, and an OLED rear light bar. The updated 4.0L twin-turbo V8 engine now outputs 471kW, enabling acceleration from 0-100km/h in 3.6 seconds.

articles.title: The new Rolls-Royce Cullinan Series II has a dark side
articles.author: Tony Davis
articles.summary: Rolls-Royce has introduced the Cullinan Series II, a revised version of its SUV, along with a Black Badge variant. The Black Badge features black highlights, a darkened Spirit of Ecstasy, and slightly more power. The Cullinan Series II offers extensive customization options, including a four-seat configuration with adjustable bucket seats, a champagne fridge, and an optional Viewing Suite with deployable seats and a cocktail table.

articles.title: Build your brand without a creative team—this AI tool does the heavy lifting
articles.author: Deal Post Team
articles.summary: AI Magicx introduces its AI content creation tools designed to assist new businesses with branding. The tools are available for a one-time purchase of $59.97 for lifetime access, providing an alternative to hiring a full creative team.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Launch, Features, Design
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 in New York, emphasizing its focus on the U.S. market. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to feature an ultra-slim design (under 10mm folded thickness), an 8-inch inner display, and potentially a 200MP primary camera, with improvements to the under-display camera as well. These features address user feedback and aim to enhance productivity and usability.

articles.title: Six new car brands coming to the UK this year including Porsche rival & EV-maker selling bargain-priced hatchback
articles.author: Michael Golson
articles.summary: Several car brands are introducing new models in the UK market. BYD's sister brand, Denza, is launching the Z9 GT, a grand tourer, with both EV and PHEV variants. NIO's sub-brand, Firefly, will offer a budget-friendly supermini. GAC is preparing to launch the Aion UT hatchback, while Renault's Mobilize will introduce the Mobilize Duo. NIO-owned brand Onvo is expected to launch the L60 coupe-SUV.

articles.title: The £300 Hoover that's so powerful shoppers say 'holy moly' reduced to £150 in Spring Sale
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Hoover is offering the HF9 vacuum cleaner at a discounted price of £149.99, reduced from its original price of £299.99. The HF9 features Anti-Twist technology, cordless operation with a Park&Go function, an LED display for battery monitoring, and LED lights on the brush head. It boasts a 30-minute runtime on full power.

articles.title: People are only just realising what Durex stands for - so, can you guess?
articles.author: XANTHA LEATHAM
articles.summary: Durex has launched an online fitting service to help men find the correct condom size. This initiative addresses a survey indicating that many men buy the wrong size due to embarrassment. The service aims to encourage men to purchase their real size without shame.

articles.title: My Nobody's Child summer dress hides bloat without anyone realising on all-inclusive holidays
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Nobody's Child is promoting their "Flossie" dress, highlighting its versatile design and comfort. The dress, priced at £85, is designed with a flattering silhouette, pockets, and breathable organic cotton material suitable for various occasions and weather conditions.

articles.title: 5 things I learned using an outrageous projector smartphone for a week
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: Unihertz has launched the Tank 3 Pro, a rugged smartphone featuring a built-in DLP projector and a massive 23,800mAh battery. The phone is designed for durability and extended use in outdoor environments.

articles.title: Skechers £18 sandals feel so much 'like walking on air' shoppers won't take them off
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer are offering Skechers Arch Fit Footsteps Day Dream Sandals for a discounted price of £18.15. These sandals feature Arch Fit technology for anatomical support, a cushioned insole, and a flexible traction outsole. They are available in multiple colors and have received positive reviews for their comfort.

articles.title: I tested this MagSafe SSD on my iPhone – it made shooting ProRes so much easier
articles.author: Alastair Jennings
articles.summary: AGI has introduced the Mag Portable SSD (EDM38), a compact, MagSafe-compatible external storage solution designed for mobile phones and laptops. It utilizes the USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 standard for fast transfer speeds (up to 2050MB/s) when connected to compatible devices, offering a plug-and-play experience for both iOS and Android systems.

articles.title: Amygdalota Tsagkaris: A sweet 100-year story in Hydra
articles.summary: Tsagkaris workshop, a confectionery business known for its amygdalota, has introduced a new product: almond-flavored ice cream. Dimitris Tsagkaris, the fourth generation in the business, created the ice cream using pure ingredients and no preservatives, incorporating almond as a crumb into a vanilla base. This ice cream has a nostalgic taste reminiscent of the 60s and requires two days to produce.

articles.title: Superdrug shoppers can get any designer perfume for just £7.99 using l
articles.author: Katie Oborn
articles.summary: Superdrug offers the Perfume Pod Ice Purple Atomiser, a refillable travel atomiser with a high-definition spray head. It holds 5ml of fragrance, providing approximately 65 sprays, and is available for £7.99 with potential discounts.

articles.title: Watch stubborn grime 'disappear' from oven doors with £1.50 'miracle' product
articles.author: Zahna Eklund
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff paste is being promoted as a "miracle" product by cleaning fans to clean ovens. Users on Reddit have highlighted the Pink Stuff paste's ability to restore ovens to a like-new condition in approximately 35 minutes.

articles.title: This Viral Podi Brand Sold Out in Just One Week in Hyderabad
articles.summary: NPR's Podi range, a new line of flavorful blends made with traditional recipes and high-quality ingredients, has launched in Hyderabad and quickly sold out on BigBasket. These Podis are not only tasty but also nutritious, offering a protein and fiber boost to meals. The Podi range can be used in a variety of creative ways, such as Podi Avocado Toast, Podi Pasta, Podi Popcorn, and Podi Roasted Nuts.

articles.title: 10 Things That Delighted Us Last Week: From the Ninja Swirl to Going-Out Flats
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Ninja Swirl, an upgrade to its popular ice-cream maker, the Ninja Creami. This week marked the debut of Reformation's first pajama collection. Bogg introduced its Best in Class beach bag as part of Set Active's latest drop.

articles.title: Phase 3 of the 2025 Global Sources Hong Kong Shows Officially Opens
articles.author: Global Sources
articles.summary: The 2025 Global Sources Hong Kong Shows opened, featuring the "Sports & Outdoor Show" and the "Baby & Children's Products Show." Over 700 exhibitors are showcasing diverse products including camping supplies, fitness equipment, baby toys, strollers, and baby furniture. The event aims to attract 15,000 visitors, promoting industry exchange and business cooperation around these new product offerings.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Motorola Edge 60 on April 24, 2025. This 5G-ready smartphone features a 5200 mAh or 5500 mAh battery with 68W wired charging and is available in Pantone colors. It includes a 6.7-inch P-OLED display, a Mediatek Dimensity 7300 processor, and a triple rear camera system with a 50MP main lens.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Motorola officially announced the Motorola Edge 60 Pro on April 24, 2025. This 5G smartphone features a Si/C Li-Ion 6000 mAh battery with 90W wired, 15W wireless, and 5W reverse wired charging. It includes a 6.7-inch P-OLED display, a Mediatek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor, and a triple rear camera setup with a 50MP main lens.

articles.title: New HONOR Experience Store opens at SM Puerto Princesa with Magic7 Pro First Day Sale
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines launched the HONOR Magic7 Pro smartphone at the opening of its new Experience Store in SM City Puerto Princesa. The HONOR Magic7 Pro features AI-powered photography, 100x Super Zoom, a Snapdragon Gen 8 Elite processor, and is available in Lunar Shadow Grey and Black, with availability in HONOR stores and online platforms. It is available also via Home Credit.

articles.title: Is Apple falling behind on hardware?
articles.author: Sam Byford
articles.summary: Apple initially lagged behind in adopting wireless charging technology, with senior VP Phil Schiller criticizing the need for additional devices. Later, Apple introduced Qi charging with the iPhone X and 8 and now leads with the MagSafe ecosystem, setting a standard for Qi2. The company also fell behind in camera hardware compared to top Android phones.

articles.title: UPEI students turn Island spuds into potato soap
articles.author: Yutaro Sasaki
articles.summary: Enactus UPEI has launched Spuds2Suds, a potato soap made from upcycled P.E.I. potatoes. This exfoliant soap, created using liquid starch extracted from potatoes, hydrating oils, and essential oils, is available for $6 at the UPEI Bookstore and online, and is also sold at Riverview Country Market and Veseys Seeds.

articles.title: CraveU AI: Launches New AI Girlfriend for Realistic Virtual Companionship
articles.author: Cozyai Llc
articles.summary: Cozyai LLC announced the launch of CraveU AI on April 27, 2025. CraveU AI is a new AI girlfriend designed for realistic virtual companionship. The platform aims to enhance user experiences and offer engaging content.

articles.title: Mobile network launches £10 a month broadband package to rival Sky, Virgin and BT
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Giffgaff, a UK mobile network provider, is launching a new broadband service offering 500mbps download speeds for £10 per month. The company is offering a promotional contract to 500 trialists, including a cash incentive to try out the service.

articles.title: ghd Duet Blowdry set with travel case is now £104 less in huge sale
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: ghd has reduced the price of its Duet Blowdry, a two-in-one hair styler that dries and styles hair simultaneously. The Duet Blowdry Hair Dryer Brush Gift Set, including a travel case and volumizing cream, is now available at a reduced price. The styler uses Heat-Air Xchange Technology and maintains a low temperature to prevent heat damage.

articles.title: Yellow Card Empowers African Businesses To Unlock Growth With Payment APIs
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Yellow Card released a new eBook titled 'Unlock the Future of Business Expansion with Payment APIs'. This eBook empowers businesses across Nigeria and the continent with insights for scaling in the digital economy. The eBook is available on the Yellow Card website.

articles.title: Motorola's iconic flip phone gets an AI reboot
articles.author: The Philadelphia Tribune
articles.summary: Motorola launched new versions of its Razr flip phone. These versions feature AI-powered features from Motorola's AI technology and that of Perplexity, Meta, Microsoft, and Google.

articles.title: Off the Grid: Sally breaks down USA TODAY's daily crossword, That Stinks! (Freestyle)
articles.author: Sally Hoelscher
articles.summary: EOS (Evolution of Smooth), a beauty and skincare company founded in 2006, is known for its lip balms. These lip balms are notable for their colorful, egg-shaped packaging, which serves as a defining characteristic of the product.

articles.title: Mersea Island could be getting a new eco-friendly laundrette
articles.author: Séamus O'Hanlon
articles.summary: Joanne Hunt and Stephen Ellis are planning to launch a laundrette in West Mersea, offering washing, drying, and ironing services, including a pick-up and drop-off option. The laundrette will also provide a 'wet cleaning' service and aims to employ three to five people from the local area.

articles.title: 'This $6 BB cream is just as good as the expensive stuff.'
articles.author: Catie Powers
articles.summary: OXX Cosmetics launched Sun Daze Tinted BB Gel, a $6 product found at Kmart. Beauty expert Leigh Campbell uses the BB gel in unconventional ways, such as mixing it with body lotion to warm up skin tone or using it as a sheer cream contour, highlighting its versatility beyond traditional BB cream uses.

articles.title: Terra Ambassadors Unwrap Joy excites consumers
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Terra Seasoning Cube unveiled its new "Terra Ambassadors Unwrap Joy" initiative, using everyday consumers as brand ambassadors.

articles.title: Nestl Nigeria reiterates commitment to providing affordable nutrition
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Nestlé Nigeria launched Golden Morn 3in1, Nigeria's first fully ready-to-eat cereal, demonstrating the company's commitment to affordable nutrition.

articles.title: GameSir Super Nova review
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: GameSir's Super Nova, a new product, is packed with the latest tech. Super Nova works on PC, Switch, iOS, and Android.

articles.title: Vice Ganda Rolls Up in Style W/ His P17.5 Million Tesla Cybertruck at McDo Launch
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: McDonald's Philippines launched a 'bigger' version of their Chicken McDo on April 21. Vice Ganda, a brand endorser, introduced the revamped Chicken McDo at the launch event. The updated version of Chicken McDo aims to attract both loyal and new customers.

articles.title: I tried Lookfantastic's April Box which saves shoppers £40 on beauty staples
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Lookfantastic's April subscription box features several new beauty products, including the L'OCCITANE Shea Butter Hand Cream, Peter Thomas Roth Waterdrench Mask, The Nue Co Supa Thick Scalp Serum, ISOCLEAN Makeup Brush Cleaner, and a Spectrum A05 Blusher Brush. The box is priced at £15 and offers deluxe-sized products and a full-sized makeup brush.

articles.title: WATCH: Vice Ganda parks P17.5 million Tesla Cybertruck
articles.author: Jan Milo Severo
articles.summary: McDonald's Philippines launched its "bigger" Chicken McDo on April 21, featuring improvements to the recipe, including smaller batch cooking for juicier chicken and updated procedures for better marinade absorption. The company is also training 'Chicken Experts' to ensure consistent quality.

articles.title: LG전자, ‘찐팬' 앰버서더와 가전 경험 알린다
articles.author: 정인혁
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched the second term of its 'LG Electronics Ambassador' program, selecting 50 customers to create video content about their experiences with LG products and services. The program aims to promote the value of 'A Better Life for All' and enhance brand perception. LG Electronics provides content creation support and incentives to the ambassadors.

articles.title: Samsung Double Hinge Phone: The Complete Guide
articles.author: Archyde News service
articles.summary: Samsung is potentially preparing to launch its first triple foldable phone, the Galaxy G Fold, as early as 2025. The G Fold is expected to feature an inward-folding design, incorporating a separate cover screen, with a speculated price exceeding $2,500, targeting early adopters and tech enthusiasts.

articles.title: Blue Prince Releases New Update
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: A new Blue Prince update has been released. The release followed a staggered approach.

articles.title: The Robot Vacuum Arms Race Is Over, and the Incredible AI-Powered Roborock Saros Z70 Has Won
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: A robot vacuum with an intelligent robotic arm is being introduced as a mass-produced home cleaning appliance. This product aims to bring home cleaning appliances into the next generation.

articles.title: 'In China for China' strategy paying off, say VW executives
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Volkswagen is set to launch over 20 state-of-the-art NEVs (New Energy Vehicles) starting in 2026. These models are specifically developed for Chinese consumers, reflecting Volkswagen's dedication to the Chinese market and its transformation.

articles.title: 13 GameCube Classics That Could Boost The Nintendo Switch 2's Library
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nintendo Switch 2's launch may initiate the addition of GameCube classics to Nintendo Switch Online. This would bring a new library of games to the service.

articles.title: New Chinese SUV with 362 kW electric motors offers high range in 10-minute charge
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Deepal, a NEV brand of Changan Group, has started the presale of its first full-size flagship SUV, the S09. The S09 is equipped with cutting-edge features and is available in five configurations: RWD Max, RWD Ultra, RWD Ultra+, AWD Ultra, and AWD.

articles.title: Say goodbye to robotic writing with this smart AI conversion tool
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: Undetectable Humanizer is a new browser-based platform that rewrites AI-generated content. It transforms AI-written content into human-readable text for blog posts, resumes, product pages, and email campaigns, and is offered with a lifetime subscription.

articles.title: K18 And The Science Of Trust: How One Haircare Brand Reframed Beauty Through Biotechnology
articles.author: Kate Hardcastle
articles.summary: K18 launched a new non-aerosol dry shampoo featuring biotechnology, which received the Best Dry Shampoo of 2024 award at the Cosmopolitan Summer Beauty Awards. The company focuses on a science-based approach, using the K18Peptide™ to repair hair at a molecular level and concentrating on a core set of products, such as the K18 Leave-In Molecular Repair Hair Mask.

articles.title: Auto Class Cars unveils all-new MG ZS in Qatar
articles.author: Qatar tribune
org: Tribune News Network Doha Auto Class Cars
articles.summary: Auto Class Cars has launched the all-new MG ZS SUV in Qatar. The vehicle features a new design language, a 1.5 T CVT engine, advanced technology like a 12.3-inch infotainment screen with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, and the MG PILOT Safety suite. The MG ZS is available at Auto Class Cars showrooms in Qatar.

articles.title: Chery's luxury and off-road divisions reveal bold SUV concepts
articles.author: Ynet
articles.summary: An automaker unveiled the Phecda luxury SUV concept and Jetour's. This represents the introduction of a new vehicle concept by the company.
